nfs4_op_link.c

00138 #define arg_LINK4 op->nfs_argop4_u.oplink
00139 #define res_LINK4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.oplink
00140 
00141 int nfs4_op_link(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00142                    compound_data_t   * data,
00143                    struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00144 {
00145   cache_entry_t  * dir_pentry = NULL ;
00146   cache_entry_t  * file_pentry = NULL ;
00147 
00148   cache_inode_status_t cache_status ;
00149 
00150   int                error ;
00151   fsal_attrib_list_t attr ;
00152   fsal_name_t        newname ;
00153   char               funcname[] = "nfs4_op_link" ;
00154   
00155   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_LINK ;
00156   res_LINK4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00157   
00158   /* If there is no FH */
00159   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00160     {
00161       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00162       return res_LINK4.status ;
00163     }
00164   
00165   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00166   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00167     {
00168       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00169       return res_LINK4.status ;
00170     }
00171   
00172   /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00173   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00174     {
00175       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00176       return res_LINK4.status ;
00177     }
00178   
00179   /* If there is no FH */
00180   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->savedFH  ) ) )
00181     {
00182       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00183       return res_LINK4.status ;
00184     }
00185   
00186   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00187   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->savedFH ) ) )
00188     {
00189       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00190       return res_LINK4.status ;
00191     }
00192   
00193   
00194   /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00195   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->savedFH) ) )
00196     {
00197       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00198       return res_LINK4.status ;
00199     }
00200   
00201   /* Pseudo Fs is explictely a Read-Only File system */
00202   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo(  &(data->currentFH) ) )
00203     {
00204       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_ROFS ;
00205       return res_LINK4.status ;
00206     }
00207   
00208   /* If data->exportp is null, a junction from pseudo fs was traversed, credp and exportp have to be updated */
00209   if( data->pexport == NULL )
00210     {
00211       if( ( error = nfs4_SetCompoundExport( data ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00212         {
00213           res_LINK4.status = error ;
00214           return res_LINK4.status ;
00215         }
00216     }
00217   
00218   /*
00219    * This operation creates a hard link, for the file represented by the saved FH, in directory represented by currentFH under the 
00220    * name arg_LINK4.target 
00221    */
00222   
00223   /* Crossing device is not allowed */
00224   if( ((file_handle_v4_t *)(data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val))->exportid != ((file_handle_v4_t *)(data->savedFH.nfs_fh4_val))->exportid )
00225     {
00226       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_XDEV ;
00227       return res_LINK4.status ;
00228     }
00229   
00230   /* If name is empty, return EINVAL */
00231   if( arg_LINK4.newname.utf8string_len == 0 )
00232     {
00233       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00234       return res_LINK4.status ;
00235     }
00236 
00237   /* Check for name to long */
00238   if( arg_LINK4.newname.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00239     {
00240       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00241       return res_LINK4.status ;
00242     }
00243 
00244 
00245   /* Convert the UFT8 objname to a regular string */
00246   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_buffdesc2name( (fsal_buffdesc_t *)&arg_LINK4.newname, 
00247                                                                       &newname ) ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00248     {
00249       res_LINK4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00250       return res_LINK4.status ;
00251     }
00252   
00253    /* Sanity check: never create a link named '.' or '..' */
00254    if( !FSAL_namecmp( &newname, &FSAL_DOT ) || !FSAL_namecmp( &newname, &FSAL_DOT_DOT )  )
00255      {
00256         res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_BADNAME ;
00257         return res_LINK4.status ;
00258      }
00259 
00260   /* get info from compound data */
00261   dir_pentry = data->current_entry ;
00262   
00263   /* Destination FH (the currentFH) must be a directory */
00264   if( data->current_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && data->current_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00265     {
00266       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTDIR ;
00267       return res_LINK4.status ;
00268     }
00269  
00270   /* Target object (the savedFH) must not be a directory */
00271   if( data->saved_filetype == DIR_BEGINNING || data->saved_filetype == DIR_CONTINUE )
00272     {
00273       res_LINK4.status = NFS4ERR_ISDIR ;
00274       return res_LINK4.status ;
00275     }
00276 
00277  
00278   /* We have to keep track of the 'change' file attribute for reply structure */
00279   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( dir_pentry,
00280                                             &attr,
00281                                             data->ht, 
00282                                             data->pclient, 
00283                                             data->pcontext,
00284                                             &cache_status) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00285     {
00286       res_LINK4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00287       return res_LINK4.status ;
00288     }
00289   memset( &(res_LINK4.LINK4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00290   res_LINK4.LINK4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before = (changeid4)dir_pentry->internal_md.mod_time ;
00291     
00292   /* Convert savedFH into a vnode */
00293   file_pentry = data->saved_entry ;
00294 
00295   /* make the link */
00296   if( cache_inode_link( file_pentry, 
00297                         dir_pentry, 
00298                         &newname, 
00299                         &attr, 
00300                         data->ht, 
00301                         data->pclient, 
00302                         data->pcontext, 
00303                         &cache_status)  != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00304     {
00305       res_LINK4.status = nfs4_Errno ( cache_status ) ;
00306       return  res_LINK4.status ;
00307     }
00308   
00309   memset( &(res_LINK4.LINK4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00310   res_LINK4.LINK4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after = (changeid4)dir_pentry->internal_md.mod_time ;
00311   res_LINK4.LINK4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00312   
00313   res_LINK4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00314   return NFS4_OK;
00315 } /* nfs4_op_link */
00316 
00317     
00328 void nfs4_op_link_Free( LINK4res * resp )
00329 { 
00330   /* Nothing to Mem_Free */
00331   return ;
00332 } /* nfs4_op_link_Free */
Generated on Wed Apr 9 08:24:28 2008 for NFS and Mount protocols layer by  1.3.9.1
